name: coderabbit-with-localstorage
title: CodeRabbit with LocalStorage
description: CodeRabbit core with browser localStorage adapter. Perfect for client-side applications, prototyping, and testing. Reports persist across page reloads in the browser.
docs: Get CODERABBIT_API_KEY from https://app.coderabbit.ai/settings/api-keys (requires Pro plan). Use LocalStorageAdapter in your useCodeRabbit hook. Reports are stored in browser localStorage and persist across page reloads.
